title: NEW HUD HAS THE TEXT TOO BIG AND PARTS ARE OFF TEH SCREEN ERYTHING IS TERRIBLE PLS HELP
body: so im running 5.15 and i logged into league and wanted to test out a skin i got, so i went into a custom and the KDA and time is at the top now. thats great except along with it has come extremely large font and the top bar with the time and KDA is now off the screen partially and overlapping eachother. i know otehrs are having the same problem so please help riot. (sorry that its really messy)
